event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A fatal error has been detected on the cable interface between two XBU's.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
A fatal error has been detected on the cable interface between two XBU's.

The entire platform is reset.

   If this is the first crossbar way being deconfigured,
   then the platform will operate with reduced performance.

   If a crossbar way has already been deconfigured,
   then the platform will be powered down.



The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU's.

   LEGEND

    RED      = SUNW-MSG-ID
    BLUE    = EVENT_ID
    GREEN = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Apr 12 17:16:39 san-dc3-1-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: BE80601000  
   EVENT-ID: 52e94002-8e56-43e6-a291-78a22ea723a3
   Refer to %FMAURL%/ SCF-8006-C3  for detailed information.

   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID:  SCF-8006-C3 , TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major    
   EVENT-TIME: Thu Apr 12 17:16:39 PDT 2007    
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: BE80601000, HOSTNAME: san-dc3-1-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID:  52e94002-8e56-43e6-a291-78a22ea723a3
   DESC: A fatal error has been detected on the cable interface between two XBU's.
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8006-C3 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: If a crossbar way has been deconfigured, the platform is powered down.
   Otherwise, a crossbar way is deconfigured. Please consult the detail section of the
   knowledge article for additional information.    
   IMPACT: The entire platform is reset. If a crossbar way has been deconfigured,
   the platform is powered down. Otherwise, a crossbar way is deconfigured and the
   platform continues to operate with reduced performance.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command


   SPARC Enterprise platform example:

   xscf> fmdump -v -u  52e94002-8e56-43e6-a291-78a22ea723a3

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Apr 12 17:16:39.0655  52e94002-8e56-43e6-a291-78a22ea723a3 SCF-8006-C3            
           66%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.fe-xb-xbucable                  

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=8                    
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=8                       
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=BE80601000:
                                  server-id=san-dc3-1-0:serial=PP06432579:
                                  part=CA06620-D301 A6:revision=0201/component=/XBU_B#8             

           33%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.fe-xb-xbucable                  

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=0                    
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=8                        
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=BE80601000:
                                  server-id=san-dc3-1-0:serial=PP06432589:
                                  part=CA06620-D301 A6:revision=0201/component=/XBU_B#0


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The entire platform is reset. If a crossbar way has been deconfigured, the platform is powered down. Otherwise, a crossbar way is deconfigured and the platform continues to operate with reduced performance. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: If a crossbar way has been deconfigured, the platform is powered down. Otherwise, a crossbar way is deconfigured. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Fatal error on cable interface between two XBU's.
